data.description: Checks for uniques against large IPv4 ranges
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is optimized to handle large numbers of IPv4 IP
    addresses, and to store / handle counts for uniquness. I currently
    use it on stretches of over 30 million for a large website. This
    leverages C's power over integers to work quickly and keep memory
    requirements low.
